title: in case of individual bungalow irrespective of plot area, redevelopment of existing buildings of Co-operative societies / development of buildings of Government / Semi-Government / Government controlled bodies including BOT / PPP projects or projects under taken through agency development under Regulation No
clause_text: in case of individual bungalow irrespective of plot area, redevelopment of existing buildings of Co-operative societies / development of buildings of Government / Semi-Government / Government controlled bodies including BOT / PPP projects or projects under taken through agency development under Regulation No.7.3, development of MHADA colony under Regulation No.7.4, Development of housing for EWS / LIG under Regulation No.7.7, Development of PMAY under Regulation No.14.4, any development in agriculture (or equivalent) zone.
